thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to July 23
thread.title_full: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to July 23 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to July 23
text:
July 11 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top economic events
Government debt auctions
Political and general news events
Index of all diaries
Guide to economic indicators
** This Diary is filed daily ***
MONDAY, JULY 13
ADDIS ABABA - Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development Secretary-General Angel Gurria speaks at the launch of the Tax Inspectors Without Borders. ADDIS ABABA - 3rd International Conference on Financing for Development (to July 16). KAMPALA - The Ugandan central bank's monetary policy committee meets to discuss economic developments in the country.
TUESDAY, JULY 14
JAKARTA - Indonesia central bank board of governors meeting. SANTIAGO - Central bank of Chile interest rate decision - 2100 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, JULY 15
ACCRA - Bank of Ghana interest rate decision - 1130 GMT.
MONDAY, JULY 20 ABUJA - Central Bank of Nigeria holds monetary policy meeting (to July 21).
TUESDAY, JULY 21
BUDAPEST - Central bank of Hungary to hold monthly rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT. PRETORIA - The South African Reserve Bank starts its three-day monetary policy committee meeting (to July 23). BANGKOK - Bank of Japan Governor Haruhiko Kuroda speaks at the Cambridge Society of Thailand - 1315 GMT.
THURSDAY, JULY 23
PRETORIA - South African Reserve Bank interest rate decision - 1300 GMT. MEXICO CITY - Central Bank of Mexico publishes Monetary policy statement - 1400 GMT.
